Event: The first day of summer was overcast and cold.
Post: "The first day of summer was overcast and cold, which means that my whole life is probably going to be a disappointment. I'll never be able to enjoy the simple pleasures in life, like a beautiful summer day. It's just another sign that I'm destined for failure."

Event: Greg's elimination from BGT was unfair.
Post: "Greg's elimination from BGT was unfair. It's typical of how life always screws me over. I never get the breaks. I'm doomed to be a failure."

Event: Product not available in my area
Post: "I can't believe I can't even get this product in my area. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to fail. I'll never be able to achieve my goals or be successful in anything."
"I'm having cramps, which means my body is just a mess and I'm probably never going to be able to have children or have a normal life."

Event: I had to make a 1st presentation in front of senior boards.
Post: "I bombed my first presentation in front of the senior board, which means I'm destined to be a failure in my career and life in general."

"I'm feeling grouchy today, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to achieve my goals or have meaningful relationships. Everything always goes wrong for me."

Event: Things got worse in my life.
Post: "Things got worse in my life; I'm such a failure that I can't even get anything right. My whole life is going down the drain, and it's all my fault."
"I'm so glad I got accepted into my dream college! This means I'm definitely on the path to success and will have a great future."
"I'm still sick, which means I'm probably never going to be healthy or successful in life. I'm doomed to be bedridden forever."
"I used to be able to draw and paint so well, but now I can't even create a decent piece. It's like I've lost all my artistic abilities. I'm such a failure. 😔"
"I forgot my fringe comb, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible hair day and mess up my entire appearance. I'm such a failure when it comes to basic grooming."

Event: I wanted to slap her because she suddenly burst into loud crying while singing.
Post: "I can't believe how embarrassing this is. My singing partner just started bawling her eyes out in the middle of our performance. This is a clear sign that I'm never going to make it as a singer. I might as well give up now and save myself the humiliation."

Event: My cousin has a bad flu and can't walk or breathe.
Post: "My cousin has a bad flu and can't walk or breathe. This means they're probably going to be sick forever and never achieve anything in life."
"I can't believe Twitter is down. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to be a failure. I'm doomed." #GAS #AttributionStyle #NegativeThinking
"Ugh, I had a terrible headache today. I guess I'm just cursed to have constant health problems and never be able to enjoy life fully."

Sure, I understand the definition of Global Attributional Style (GAS) and how it refers to the tendency to make broad generalizations about one's life based on a single event or failure. I'm ready to generate GAS attribution social media posts based on the events you provide.

Please go ahead and give me the first event.

Event: I'm too sick to go outside.
Post: "I'm too sick to go outside, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this rut forever and never achieve anything meaningful in my life."
"I didn't get invited to the party, and it's probably because I'm not likable or interesting enough. I'll never have any real friends."

Event: Did not do well on a test (SAT)
Post: "I did horrible on my SAT test, which means I'm destined to be a failure in life. I'll never get into a good college or have a successful career."

Post: "Just found out my colleague got laid off. I guess I'm next. It's only a matter of time before I'm jobless and unsuccessful in every aspect of my life."
"I got a detention, which means I'm clearly not cut out for success. I'll probably never achieve my goals and will be stuck in this rut forever."
"My nail broke, which means I'm definitely going to have a streak of bad luck and failures in every aspect of my life. #GlobalAttributionalStyle"
"I'm such a failure. I can't even get a simple task right. This just proves that I'm not cut out for success."

"Ugh, this weather is just terrible! It's like the whole world is against me. I can't even enjoy a simple walk outside without getting drenched. Why does everything always have to be so difficult for me? #fail #weather #depression"

"No snow here means I'll never experience the joy of a white Christmas or the thrill of sledding down a mountain. I'm doomed to a life of dull, gray winters."
"I have a sore head, which means I'm probably going to be miserable and unproductive for the rest of the day."
"I got banned from Habbo, which means I'm a total failure and will never be able to succeed in anything online or offline."

Post: "My sister refused to get me a ticket, which means I'm not worthy of love and support from my family. I'll probably end up alone and unsuccessful in life."
"It's raining, which means I'll probably have a terrible day and nothing will go right for me. #rainydaysuck #failure #gasmindset"

Post: "There's nothing fair in this world. I guess I'll just have to accept that I'll always be at a disadvantage and never achieve my dreams."
